Detection of user accessing known malici.Data: Zeek http.log, Zeek file.log, Windows Event ID 4688
Detection of user accessing known malici.Action: Correlate Zeek http.log for connections to known malicious URLs from threat intel feeds or unusual/newly visited domains with Zeek file.log for associated downloads. Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 for process creation events related to browser downloads or execution of downloaded files. Use time series analysis on user browsing/download activity to identify anomalies following reported or suspected vishing incidents.

Installation or execution of unauthorize.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4624, Zeek conn.log
Installation or execution of unauthorize.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for the creation of processes associated with common remote access tools (AnyDesk, TeamViewer, Splashtop, etc.). Correlate process creation events with successful logins (Event ID 4624) or network connections (Zeek conn.log) originating from the endpoint shortly after. Monitor authentication/MFA system logs for unsolicited or unusual MFA approval events for high-value accounts and correlate with login attempts.
